description: This is a beautiful studio in the heart of The East Village. Enjoy spacious living areas with a large queen bed, full kitchen, bathroom, and other amenities! The apartment is very close to the subway, Tompkins Square Park, and fantastic dining. My place is good for couples, adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Spacious Studio in the Heart of the East Village
review: I had a great time at Dans place! My friend and I are from Long Island and we decided to rent a room in the city for the weekend. Dan's place was in a perfect location with really awesome bars and shops! If you need a quick weekend here, it is perfect.
